sentences.sContent: Over a tenth of the population have secure, undemanding jobs.
sentences.sCn: 超过十分之一的人口有安定的，要求不高的工作。

synos.tran: 要求不高的；容易的；不严格的

trans.tranCn: 不严格的； 要求不高的
trans.tranOther: If you describe something such as a job as undemanding, you mean that it does not require you to work very hard or to think a great deal about it
